officialTitle: A Randomized Controlled Trial of 18-22mg/kg/d Ursodeoxycholic in Refractory Primary Biliary Cholangitis
inclusionCriteria:
* Patients diagnosed with primary biliary cholangitis
* Treated with Ursodeoxycholic Acid in West China Hospital for at least 6 month and suboptimal response to Ursodeoxycholic Acid
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 70 Years
